course_title: Special Topics in Contemporary Journalism - IMAGINE JRNLSM

001.comments: This course is open to first and scond year Master of Journalism students however if you are a non-MJ students interested in this area of study, please email soj.grad@ubc.ca.  If the course becomes full, please email jrnl.journal@ubc.ca to be added to the Waitlist.For non-MJ students who are interested in registering for the course, please email soj.grad@ubc.ca.
